speaker: Male Speaker
narrator_cue: Do you remember the word the postman might use in handing you something?

speaker: Female Speaker
narrator_cue: Ask him how much you owe.

speaker: Female Speaker
text: Je peux vous donner des dollars.

speaker: Male Speaker
narrator_cue: He says, I don't want any.

speaker: Male Speaker
narrator_cue: Tell me, "It's a lot of money."

speaker: Male Speaker
narrator_cue: Say, "Eighteen dollars, It's a lot of money."

speaker: Male Speaker
narrator_cue: Try to say, "It's too much money."

speaker: Female Speaker
narrator_cue: Ask me how much money I have.

speaker: Male Speaker
narrator_cue: Tell me you have twenty-five dollars.

speaker: Female Speaker
narrator_cue: Tell me that I have too much money.

speaker: Male Speaker
narrator_cue: Tell me you have thirty francs.

speaker: Male Speaker
narrator_cue: Tell me you have thirty-nine francs.

speaker: Male Speaker
narrator_cue: Ask, "How many dollars do you want?"

speaker: Female Speaker
text: Est-ce que vous avez de l'argent?
narrator_cue: Try to say, "Do you have some money?"

speaker: Female Speaker
narrator_cue: Est-ce que vous voudriez faire quelque chose maintenant?

speaker: Female Speaker
narrator_cue: Est-ce que vous voudriez boire une bière avec moi?

speaker: Female Speaker
narrator_cue: Est-ce que vous pouvez en acheter pour moi?

speaker: Female Speaker
text: Oui, je peux aussi en acheter.
narrator_cue: Est-ce que vous pouvez aussi acheter du vin?

speaker: Female Speaker
narrator_cue: Alors, je vais avec vous, d'accord?
